channel.title: Need help! [delta]
channel.description: hey i need help how to make so you just can get like 2 starter pack on same ip on delta source please help!

item.title: Need help! [delta]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

It does work, I just tested for myself

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! [delta]
item.dc:creator: @coola99 coola99
item.description:
@coola99 wrote:

but it dont works to make so u just can get 2 starter packs the next 24 hours? on the same ip? [quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:419111”]Well, if u look in your client class,
u will see somewhere,

if (starter == 0) { starter = 1; }
this makes that when the player didnt had a starter it adds one
so i guess u prob want to do it with a command
so it will be something like

if(command.startsWith("starter") && starter == 1)) { starter = 2; }

And where your first starter items are, add a 2nd code for your 2nd starter[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! [delta]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Well, if u look in your client class,
u will see somewhere,

if (starter == 0) { starter = 1; }
this makes that when the player didnt had a starter it adds one
so i guess u prob want to do it with a command
so it will be something like

if(command.startsWith("starter") && starter == 1)) { starter = 2; }

And where your first starter items are, add a 2nd code for your 2nd starter

Read full topic
